mapper.select: select count(menu_id) as visitCount, lmt.menu_name from lunch_log ll join lunch_menu lm on ll.menu_id = lm.id join lunch_menu_type lmt on lm.menu_type = lmt.menu_type group by lm.menu_type

select T.visitCount, ( select ( case when T.day = 2 then 'MON' when T.day = 3 then 'TUE' when T.day = 4 then 'WED' when T.day = 5 then 'THU' when T.day = 6 then 'FRI' end ) ) as day from ( select count(1) as visitCount, dayofweek(ll.insert_date_time) as day from lunch_log ll join lunch_menu lm on ll.menu_id = lm.id where lm.menu_type = #{menuType} group by dayofweek(ll.insert_date_time)) as T order by T.day
